name: Elimination of the Species
description:
Charles Darwin has messed up. He's accidentally spilled evolution juice all over his animal specimens, transforming them into horrible monsters! It's up to Darwin to retrieve the magic God Platypus and stop these creatures!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim Gun

Left Mouse Button - Fire Gun

Programmers:

James Nunes

Benny Coan-Nixon

Artists:

Nick Rioux

Ben Clingen
